column4: I'm wondering if anyone has any experience with running world of warcraft in wine on ubuntu? I'm getting some weird graphical issues I just can't figure out.
I think with recent wine it should be fine if your graphic driver allows it
I'm worried that I have an incorrect driver. I am using "Nvidia X Server"
game play is very smooth, and it works great, but movement can be less fluid. for example, wings on a flying mount stop flapping when moving over certain axis.
